description:
Lightweight jacket or super-warm shirt? This fleece layer is packable and ideal for bridging climate zones or hiking through changeable mountain weather.

  • Flat-knit fleece on hood, shoulders and chest, with grid-structured fleece on lower sleeves, sides and lower torso
  • Polyester fabric is partially recycled, wicks moisture and quick to dry
  • Snug-fitting hood
  • Chest pocket and hand pockets all with zippers
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trail Fleece - Men's
